short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the visual portion of videos and album covers on music sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just The Music is used to hide the visual portions (video, album covers, etc.) of sites that offer music, providing a distraction-free way to listen to music online.

TO USE:
While in a tab, click the icon in your extensions tray. After one second, videos and album covers will be hidden for the specified tab.

Currently supports the following sites:
-------------------------------------------------
- YouTube
- Pandora
- Vimeo
- SoundCloud [New!]

To report issues or see the changelog, head to the GitHub page:
https://github.com/sampellino/just_the_music
